segments.text: Hello , Miss . I want to listen to the music . Could you tell me how to adjust it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . There are several kinds of music . What do you like to listen to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like listening to the classical music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , here it is . Can you hear it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Which channel is for opera ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I have got it . How nice are the singers singing !
segments.speaker: S1
